verses.roman:
ānandita haila ācārya, śacī, bhakta, saba
prati-dina kare ācārya mahā-mahotsava

synonyms: ānandita haila—became pleased; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; śacī—mother Śacīdevī; bhakta—the devotees; saba—all; prati-dina—every day; kare—does; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; mahā-mahā-utsava—great festival.
translation: Lord Caitanya's decision was received very happily by Advaita Ācārya, mother Śacī and all the devotees. Advaita Ācārya celebrated every day with a great festival.
